md:
giải nghĩa từ "redesign" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Redesign (verb) - Đổi thiết kế

* Meaning: to change the design or structure of something, such as a product, system, or organization, in order to improve it or make it more effective.
* Example sentence: The company decided to redesign their website to make it more user-friendly.
* Related words: redesign, revamp, overhaul, restructure, reorganize
* Antonyms: maintain, preserve, keep, retain

Redesign (noun) - Thiết kế lại

* Meaning: the act of changing the design or structure of something, such as a product, system, or organization, in order to improve it or make it more effective.
* Example sentence: The redesign of the product was a major success, increasing sales by 20%.
* Related words: redesign, makeover, renovation, reconstruction, reformation
* Antonyms: maintenance, preservation, retention, status quo

Note: The verb "redesign" can also be used in the context of rethinking or reimagining something, such as a concept or an idea, in order to improve it or make it more effective.
